name: Scrap Reavers
description:
Objective: Survive for as long as possible in the one room that will be your grave.
Refresh the page to restart the game.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, mouse to aim and fire, CTRL to switch weapons, M to mute.

Weapons: Bullet, Cannon, Rocket, Laser, Wave

Each weapon is upgraded independently from each other.

Power ups: Health, Shield, Weapon Power Up, Weapon Speed Up, Weapon Shot Up

Enemies:

Hoverer, Shambler, Drifter, Guardian

Acquire weapons by defeating the Guardian that appears at every 5th wave.

Programming and Graphics by @juegoman

Graphics by @Lazenman
